attributes.action: John Lennon Imagine for National ( global) anthem
attributes.additional_details:
O.K,

I like the Royal Family.

So dont see this as a slur...

 But.

We are a modern country,

Just Ask Mr Cromwell..

And if like me you believe that the notion of a country is exactly what is stunting the growth of humanity, then I would quite like to suggest that we as a trail blazing group of nations consider replacing the anthem of a monarch. (God Save her)

With this......

The anthem of humanity and rest of us

Its this or the Rage against the machine song again......and im holding out for this one!
